contest.title: Winter free book giveaway
contest.text:
Rules of the contest:
1. Share and like WhatShouldIRead's page on Facebook or follow on Twitter.
2. Post on the bot's facebook page or write a tweet including the author and title of the book you wish to read and have. *If you write a tweet please make sure to include the bot's name(@wsirbot) and #wsir hastag.
3. Wait for the end of the contest which will be 1st December, when a random person will be picked and win the book choosen by them in the format they want(phisical book / ebook / audiobook)
4.The winner will be contacted in private on how to receive the prize.
5. !IMPORTANT!. You are allowed only one *entry per person. Any additional entry will be removed and will not count.
*One entry means a single post on facebook or tweet on twitter.

Terms & Conditions:
What Should I Read (#WSIR) reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel, terminate, modify or suspend the contest should virus, bug, non-authorized human intervention, fraud, or other cause beyond our control corrupt or affect the administration, security, fairness, or proper conduct of the contest. In such case, we may select the Winner from all eligible entries received prior to and/or after (if appropriate) the action taken by me. I reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to disqualify any individual who tampers or attempts to tamper with the entry process or the operation of the contest or website or violates these Terms & Conditions.
